name: L.I.F.E Support - The Game
description: Still In Version One - This game has been in indev, alpha and been in beta and has been played by IGN. Unfortunately it has no cover art or screenshots as the game has been covered by copyright so no one can do that.It is in version 1 and has been tested in versions: 0.01, 0.1, 0.6, 0.1.99
